titles.title: Providing for the attendance of the House at the Inaugural Ceremonies of the President and Vice President of the United States.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 1/14/2013--Passed House without amendment. Requires: (1) at 10:30 a.m. on Monday, January 21, 2013, the House to proceed to the West Front of the Capitol to attend the inaugural ceremonies of the President and Vice President of the United States; and (2) upon the conclusion of the ceremonies, the House to adjourn until 10 a.m. on Tuesday, January 22, 2013.
